exec: pm.test('Response has correct content type', function () {

description.content:
Comprehensive API collection for RetailGenie - A complete retail management system with AI-powered features.

## üöÄ Features Covered:
- Product Management (CRUD operations)
- User Authentication (Register/Login)
- AI Assistant Chat
- Product Recommendations
- Analytics Dashboard
- Feedback System
- Advanced Search
- WebSocket Statistics
- Admin Operations

## üîê Authentication:
Most requests require a Bearer token. Use the Login request to get a token, then set it in the collection variables.

## üìù Usage:
1. Run the 'Register User' or 'Login User' request
2. Copy the token from the response
3. Set the 'authToken' collection variable
4. All authenticated requests will automatically use this token

## üåê Environments:
Configure different environments for:
- Development: http://localhost:5000
- Staging: https://staging-api.retailgenie.com
- Production: https://api.retailgenie.com
